quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Be the change you want to see.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

quotes.author: Gautama Buddha
quotes.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: As soon as you have made a thought, laugh at it.

quotes.author: Laozi
quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.

quotes.author: Laozi
quotes.quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

quotes.author: Laozi
quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.

quotes.author: Laozi
quotes.quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
